verses.verse: But I <S%G2919>determined<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> for my <S%G1683>own<s%> <S%G1683>sake,<s%> that I would not <S%G2064>come<s%> to you in <S%G3077>sorrow<s%> <S%G3825>again.<s%>

For <S%G1487>if<s%> I <S%G3076>cause<s%> you <S%G3076>sorrow,<s%> <S%G5101>who<s%> <S%G2532>then<s%> <S%G2165>makes<s%> me <S%G2165>glad<s%> but the one whom I <S%G3076>made<s%> <S%G3076>sorrowful<s%>?

And <S%G3778>this<s%> is the <S%G846>very<s%> <S%G846>thing<s%> I <S%G1125>wrote<s%> you, <S%G2443>lest,<s%> <S%G3361><s%> when I <S%G2064>came,<s%> I should <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G3077>sorrow<s%> from those <S%G3739>who<s%> <S%G1163>ought<s%> to <S%G1163>make<s%> me <S%G5463>rejoice;<s%> <S%G3982>having<s%> <S%G3982>confidence<s%> in you <S%G3956>all,<s%> that my <S%G5479>joy<s%> would be [the joy] of you <S%G3956>all.<s%>

For out of <S%G4183>much<s%> <S%G2347>affliction<s%> and <S%G4928>anguish<s%> of <S%G2588>heart<s%> I <S%G1125>wrote<s%> to you with <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G1144>tears;<s%> not that you should be <S%G3076>made<s%> <S%G3076>sorrowful,<s%> but that you might <S%G1097>know<s%> the <S%G26>love<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> I <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G4053>especially<s%> for you.

But <S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G5100>any<s%> has <S%G3076>caused<s%> <S%G3076>sorrow,<s%> he has <S%G3076>caused<s%> <S%G3076>sorrow<s%> not to me, but in <S%G3313>some<s%> <S%G3313>degree<s%> – in <S%G2443>order<s%> not to <S%G1912>say<s%> <S%G1912>too<s%> <S%G1912>much<s%> – to <S%G3956>all<s%> of you.
<S%G2425>Sufficient<s%> for <S%G5108>such<s%> a <S%G5108>one<s%> is <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G2009>punishment<s%> which was [inflicted by] the <S%G4183>majority,<s%>

<S%G5620>so<s%> that on the <S%G5121>contrary<s%> you should <S%G3123>rather<s%> <S%G5483>forgive<s%> and <S%G3870>comfort<s%> [him], <S%G3381>lest<s%> <S%G4458>somehow<s%> <S%G5108>such<s%> a <S%G5108>one<s%> be <S%G2666>overwhelmed<s%> by <S%G4053>excessive<s%> <S%G3077>sorrow.<s%>

For to <S%G3778>this<s%> end <S%G2532>also<s%> I <S%G1125>wrote<s%> that I might <S%G1097>put<s%> you to the <S%G1382>test,<s%> <S%G1487>whether<s%> you are <S%G5255>obedient<s%> in <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3956>things.<s%>

But <S%G3739>whom<s%> you <S%G5483>forgive<s%> <S%G5100>anything,<s%> I [forgive] <S%G2532>also;<s%> for <S%G2532>indeed<s%> <S%G3739>what<s%> I have <S%G5483>forgiven,<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> I have <S%G5483>forgiven<s%> <S%G5100>anything,<s%> [I did it] for your <S%G1223>sakes<s%> in the <S%G4383>presence<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ,<s%>
in <S%G2443>order<s%> that <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G4122>advantage<s%> be <S%G4122>taken<s%> of us by <S%G4567>Satan;<s%> for we are not <S%G50>ignorant<s%> of his <S%G3540>schemes.<s%>
<S%G1161>Now<s%> when I <S%G2064>came<s%> to <S%G5174>Troas<s%> for the <S%G2098>gospel<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ<s%> and when a <S%G2374>door<s%> was <S%G455>opened<s%> for me in the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%>

I <S%G2192>had<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G425>rest<s%> for my <S%G4151>spirit,<s%> not <S%G2147>finding<s%> <S%G5103>Titus<s%> my <S%G80>brother;<s%> but <S%G657>taking<s%> my <S%G657>leave<s%> of them, I <S%G1831>went<s%> on to <S%G3109>Macedonia.<s%>

But <S%G5485>thanks<s%> be to <S%G2316>God,<s%> who <S%G3842>always<s%> <S%G2358>leads<s%> us in His <S%G2358>triumph<s%> in <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> and <S%G5319>manifests<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> us the <S%G3744>sweet<s%> <S%G3744>aroma<s%> of the <S%G1108>knowledge<s%> of Him in <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G5117>place.<s%>

For we are a <S%G2175>fragrance<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ<s%> to <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> <S%G3588>those<s%> who are being <S%G4982>saved<s%> and <S%G1722>among<s%> <S%G3588>those<s%> who are <S%G622>perishing;<s%>

to the <S%G3739>one<s%> <S%G3303><s%> an <S%G3744>aroma<s%> from <S%G2288>death<s%> to <S%G2288>death,<s%> to the <S%G3739>other<s%> an <S%G3744>aroma<s%> from <S%G2222>life<s%> to <S%G2222>life.<s%> And <S%G5101>who<s%> is <S%G2425>adequate<s%> for <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3778>things<s%>?

For we are not <S%G5613>like<s%> <S%G4183>many,<s%> <S%G2585>peddling<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> but as from <S%G1505>sincerity,<s%> but as from <S%G2316>God,<s%> we <S%G2980>speak<s%> in <S%G5547>Christ<s%> in the <S%G2713>sight<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>
